attributes.action: Raise income threshold for child benefit clawback to £60,000 from £50,000.
attributes.additional_details: Raise income threshold for child benefit clawback to £60,000, due to interest rates, inflation and everything going up / financial pressures on families.
attributes.background: Raise income threshold for child benefit clawback to £60,000 from £50,000.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634097
